thread.title: BRIEF-City Of London Investment Management Says U.S. Court Denies China Fund Motion For Injunctive Relief

title: BRIEF-City Of London Investment Management Says U.S. Court Denies China Fund Motion For Injunctive Relief

organizations.name: brief-city of london investment management says
court denies china fund motion for injunctive relief reuters staff
city of london investment management company limited

text:
April 10, 2018 / 7:49 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-City Of London Investment Management Says U.S. Court Denies China Fund Motion For Injunctive Relief Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 10 (Reuters) - City of London Investment Management Company Limited: 
* CITY OF LONDON INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT CO LTD SAYS U.S. COURT DENIED MOTIONS MADE BY CHINA FUND INC IN ITS LEGAL ACTION AGAINST CITY OF LONDON 
* CITY OF LONDON INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT CO LTD SAYS IT REPRESENTS CLIENTS WHO ARE BENEFICIAL OWNERS OF ABOUT 27.6% OF CHINA FUND INCâ€™S OUTSTANDING SHARES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
